typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: 'azureadf',
	fileName: 'test.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Filter1
